param.name: vis

param.description: Pre-name of output images

param.name: outlierfile
param.description: Text file with image names, sizes, centers for outliers

param.name: field
param.description: Field Name or id

param.name: spw

param.name: selectdata
param.description: Other data selection parameters

param.description: Range of time to select from data

param.name: uvrange
param.description: Select data within uvrange

param.name: antenna
param.description: Select data based on antenna/baseline

param.name: scan
param.description: Scan number range

param.name: observation
param.description: Observation ID range

param.name: intent
param.description: Scan Intent(s)

param.name: mode
param.description: Spectral gridding type (mfs, channel, velocity, frequency)

param.description: Re-restore the cube image to a common beam when True

param.name: gridmode
param.description: Gridding kernel for FFT-based transforms, default=\'\' None

param.name: wprojplanes
param.description: Number of w-projection planes for convolution

param.description: Number of facets along each axis (main image only)

param.description: Parallactic angle increment (degrees) for computing A-term

param.description: Switch-on the PS-Term?

param.description: Switch-on the M-Term?

param.description: Trigger the wide-band A-Projection algorithm?

param.description: Use frequency conjugate beams in WB A-Projection algorithm?

param.description: Maximum number of iterations

param.description: Loop gain for cleaning

param.description: Flux level to stop cleaning, must include units: \'1.0mJy\'

param.name: psfmode

param.name: ftmachine
param.description: Gridding method for the image

param.description: Individually weight the fields of the mosaic

param.name: multiscale
param.description: Deconvolution scales (pixels); [] = standard clean

param.description: Stop cleaning if the largest scale finds this number of neg components

param.description: a bias to give more weight toward smaller scales

param.description: Use interactive clean (with GUI viewer)

param.name: mask
param.description: Cleanbox(es), mask image(s), region(s), or a level

param.name: nchan
param.description: Number of channels (planes) in output image; -1 = all

param.description: start of output spectral dimension

param.description: width of output spectral channels

param.name: outframe
param.description: velocity frame of output image

param.name: veltype
param.description: velocity definition (radio, optical, true)

param.description: x and y image size in pixels. Single value: same for both

param.description: x and y cell size(s). Default unit arcsec.

param.name: phasecenter
param.description: Image center: direction or field index

param.name: restfreq
param.description: Rest frequency to assign to image (see help)

param.name: stokes
param.description: Stokes params to image (eg I,IV,IQ,IQUV)

param.name: weighting
param.description: Weighting of uv (natural, uniform, briggs, ...)

param.name: robust
param.description: Briggs robustness parameter

param.name: uvtaper
param.description: Apply additional uv tapering of visibilities

param.name: outertaper
param.description: uv-taper on outer baselines in uv-plane

param.name: innertaper
param.description: uv-taper in center of uv-plane (not implemented)

param.description: Name of model image(s) to initialize cleaning

param.description: Output Gaussian restoring beam for CLEAN image

param.name: pbcor
param.description: Output primary beam-corrected image

param.name: minpb
param.description: Minimum PB level to use

param.name: usescratch
param.description: True if to save model visibilities in MODEL_DATA column

param.name: noise
param.description: noise parameter for briggs abs mode weighting

param.name: npixels
param.description: number of pixels for superuniform or briggs weighting

param.name: npercycle
param.description: Clean iterations before interactive prompt (can be changed)

param.name: cyclefactor
param.description: Controls how often major cycles are done. (e.g. 5 for frequently)

param.name: cyclespeedup
param.description: Cycle threshold doubles in this number of iterations

param.name: nterms
param.description: Number of Taylor coefficients to model the sky frequency dependence

param.name: reffreq
param.description: Reference frequency (nterms > 1),\'\' uses central data-frequency

param.name: chaniter
param.description: Clean each channel to completion (True), or all channels each cycle (False)

param.name: flatnoise
param.description: Controls whether searching for clean components is done in a constant noise residual image (True) or in an optimal signal-to-noise residual image (False)

param.name: allowchunk
param.description: Divide large image cubes into channel chunks for deconvolution
